name: AHMEDABAD MANAGEMENT ASSOCIATION
briefDescription: Ahmedabad Management Association (AMA) was established in 1967 under the leadership of renowned Indian Space Scientist, Dr. Vikram Sarabhai. Since then AMA has catered to different section of the population ranging from Management professionals to vocational professionals. It promotes and trains students, managers, budding entrepreneurs, working women and children in self-development techniques. Personality development,  upgrading the skills and continuous education has been the main purpose of running this charitable organization.
